paper_abstract: In this paper, we study a boundary value problem involving the nonlinear Duffing equation with both integral and non-integral forcing terms, and separated boundary conditions. We develop a generalized quasilinearization algorithm to obtain monotone sequences of lower and upper solutions converging uniformly and quadratically to the unique Solution of the problem. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Approximation of solutions of the nonlinear Duffing equation involving both integral and non-integral forcing terms with separated boundary conditions
